settings.question: Do you ship overseas?
settings.answer: Yes, we ship all over the world. Shipping costs will apply, and will be added at checkout. We run discounts and promotions all year, so stay tuned for exclusive deals.

settings.question: How long will it take to get my orders?
settings.answer: It depends on where you are. Orders processed here will take 5-7 business days to arrive. Overseas deliveries can take anywhere from 7-16 days. Delivery details will be provided in your confirmation email.

settings.question: Any question?
settings.answer: You can contact us through our contact page! We will be happy to assist you.

settings.question: Where do you ship?
settings.answer: We offer shipping to the contiguous United States and Canada. We are able to ship anywhere in the world. If you live outside of North America, shipping costs will be automatically calculated at checkout.

settings.question: How much does shipping cost?
settings.answer:
Standard shipping is free in the contiguous United States and in Canada. If you live on the island territories or Northern Canada your shipping charges will be calculated at checkout.

If you live elsewhere in the world, your shipping charges will also be calculated at checkout.

Expedited and express shipping costs will be calculated at checkout.

settings.question: Do I need to pay duties?
settings.answer:
If you live in the United States or Canada, you will not be charged import duties. You may be charged state or provincial taxes in accordance with local laws. These will be calculated at checkout.

If you reside internationally, you may be charged additional duties and taxes. These are incurred at the customer’s expense.

settings.question: When will I receive my order?
settings.answer:
We offer free standard shipping, and expedited shipping. Please remember that your order will take time to process before it ships. Even if you select expedited or express shipping, your order will take a few days to be processed through our system:

Free Standard shipping: Delivery time: 4-6 business day

Expedited shipping: Delivery time: 3 business days

Express shipping: Delivery time: 1-2 business days

settings.question: When will my pre-order ship?
settings.answer: If you ordered an item that has an estimated shipping date set in the future, you have pre-ordered that item. It will ship within 7-9 business days of the date indicated on the website at the time of purchase. You will receive order confirmation and shipping notification emails, as well as email updates should any other circumstances arise.

settings.question: Do you ship to P.O. Boxes?
settings.answer: Unfortunately, we cannot ship to P.O. Boxes or A.P.O addresses at this time. If you don’t have a residential address, please reach out to our team at allshadesbeyou@gmail.com before placing your order, and we will do our best to assist you!

settings.question: What is my order status?
settings.answer: We will email you at every step of the process, from purchase to post-delivery. You will receive an email confirmation of your order, a notification when your order is being prepared for shipping, a notification with tracking information when your order ships, and a check-in email after your purchase has been delivered to ensure you are happy with your AllShades BeYOUtiful pieces. If you have any questions in the meantime, please feel free to contact us at allshadesbeyou@gmail.com

settings.question: Can I cancel my order?
settings.answer:
Your purchase begins its journey to you as soon as you complete the checkout process. We unfortunately do not have a cancellation window. Once an order has begun processing, it cannot be altered.

If you wish to make changes to your order, please contact us via email at allshadesbeyou@gmail.com. Our team will do our best to accommodate your request.

settings.question: What is your return policy for all other items?
settings.answer: For bags, apparel, and accessories, you may initiate a return within 30 days of the delivery of your item. Items eligible for return must be in brand new, unused condition, with all original packaging intact. The shipping cost of your return will be deducted from your total refund.

settings.question: What is your exchange policy?
settings.answer: If you wish to exchange an item, you will need to initiate a return for your original purchase, and make a separate purchase for the item you wish to receive instead. If you have any questions, please contact allshadesbeyou@gmail.com for assistance.

settings.question: How does your sizing work?
settings.answer: For clothing, our design philosophy is centred around flexible and flowy cuts and our sizes range from XS to 2XL. If you are between sizes we suggest ordering a size up. If your size is outside of the sizes we offer, you can email us at allsadesbeyou@gmail.com and we can let you know if there is a possibility to custom fit your order to your measurements.

settings.question: Where can I find your privacy policy?
settings.answer: You can find it here Privacy Policy
